title: GT Recycling expands plastic recycling plant - Waste Management Review
summary: GT Recycling in Geelong has introduced a new flexible plastics recycling line to convert various plastics into pellets for manufacturing, aligning with circular economy goals and boosting domestic markets. The company received state and federal funding to enhance its recycling operations and reduce plastic waste going to landfills.
green_innovation: TRUE. This article describes an innovation in the recycling industry that contributes to environmental sustainability goals by reducing waste and promoting recycling in line with circular economy principles.
business_innovation: TRUE. The introduction of a new flexible plastics recycling line by GT Recycling represents a significant improvement in the firm's business process, moving towards more sustainable practices and boosting its market offerings.
green_product: TRUE. The article discusses the production of pellets from recycled plastics, which aligns with the definition of a green product as it significantly reduces environmental impact by promoting recycling and reducing the need for virgin plastics.
green_process: TRUE. The article highlights the implementation of an advanced recycling process by GT Recycling, which minimizes environmental impacts, reduces waste, and promotes sustainability in the manufacturing industry.

greenwashing: FALSE. The article provides specific details about real efforts and investments made by GT Recycling to improve their recycling processes and reduce environmental impacts, indicating a genuine commitment to sustainability rather than greenwashing.
